dictionary.lore: A city was once invaded, it's people left helpless, and only one young knight stayed behind to protect them. It's said that no matter how badly he was outnumbered or how many wounds he bore, every time he fell the crystal on his chest would shine and he'd be immediately back on his feet. Little did the knight know that this crystal harnessed the power of a phantom bird burning bright with the flames of invincibility.
